items.sentence: Maybe we can do that later when we\'re not so busy.
All of Tom\'s grandparents died before he was born.
I know a couple of good restaurants on Park Street.
I know a guy who knows a guy who knows Tom Jackson.
I know that Tom can speak French better than I can.
Mary was wearing the dress her mother made for her.
Tom is the one who wrote the song that I just sang.
How did you convince Tom to help us paint the barn?
Tom told Mary she shouldn\'t go out at night alone.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t want John to do that.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t want to study French.
What are some things I can do to improve my French?
We can\'t be sure which door Tom will come through.
When are you going to tell Tom about what happened?
I didn\'t realize Tom and Mary both had to do that.
I didn\'t want to tell you about this on the phone.
I told Tom to swim a little every day for exercise.
Maybe that\'s the reason why Tom isn\'t here today.
It was foolish of you to try to get Tom to do that.
It was too risky, so I decided not to try doing it.
I wonder why Tom told me I didn\'t have to do that.
Everything was done right, down to the last detail.
Apparently, Tom is going to a university in Boston.
Are there any good places to play golf around here?
Are you aware of anyone who would want to harm Tom?
Tom didn\'t seem very surprised that Mary did that.
Tom learned how to sing many songs from his father.
Tom likes reading science fiction novels in French.
Please turn off the lights when you leave the room.
I can\'t complain about the way I\'ve been treated.
I heard that Tom and Mary are going to get married.
I heard that you want to learn how to speak French.
I heard there was a fire on Park Street last night.
I hope Tom will come and pick me up at the airport.
Can you send someone to fix it as soon as possible?
The problem is that Tom isn\'t a very good teacher.
Tom may do that for us, but then again, he may not.
Tom met Mary and her friends for drinks after work.
Tom met Mary in the park on his way home from work.
Tom and Mary promised me that they\'d study French.
How long did it take you to learn French this well?
How much longer do you think this is going to last?
They\'re still waiting for us to make up our minds.
I\'m still not used to working so many hours a day.
I\'ve been wanting to learn French for a long time.
I\'ve finally gotten used to living here in Boston.
Tom told Mary not to worry about what might happen.
Tom was bitten by a snake while he was on vacation.
Tom didn\'t really want to deal with the situation.
I debated for hours with my friends on the subject.
